lead_paragraph: Penalties include a $16 million fine for the German automaker, which prosecutors said falsified emissions and noise-level documentation.

headline.print_headline: South Korea Bans Volkswagen From Selling 80 Models
headline.main: South Korea Bans Volkswagen From Selling 80 Models in Country

snippet: Penalties include a $16 million fine for the German automaker, which prosecutors said falsified emissions and noise-level documentation....
abstract: South Korea bans Volkswagen from selling 80 models in country, part of country's ongoing aggressive response to carmaker's diesel emissions scandal.
